title: New Year Celebration
description: Join us for a festive New Year's celebration with music and fireworks!

title: Winter Workshop
description: A hands-on workshop to learn winter crafts and decorations.

title: Spring Into Coding
description: A beginner coding workshop for students interested in programming.

title: Earth Day Cleanup
description: Help us make a difference by cleaning up the community park for Earth Day.

title: Summer Kickoff Party
description: Celebrate the start of summer with games, food, and fun activities!

title: Tech Talk Expo
description: Industry leaders discuss the latest trends in technology and innovation.

title: Back to School Bash
description: An event to prepare students for the school year with supplies and resources.

title: Autumn Arts Festival
description: A festival celebrating local artists with food stalls and live performances.

title: Halloween Spooktacular
description: A Halloween event with costume contests, games, and spooky stories.

title: Holiday Gift Fair
description: Shop unique holiday gifts from local vendors and enjoy seasonal treats.
